title: This group won without a single kill and Riot bans them all for 14 days

embed.description: Being on the Red Team = FeelsBadMan Thanks for all the subs, likes, comments and shares! Helps me a lot!

body:
These guys or gals came up with a really cool and unique way to play an ascension in league of legends and it has worked for them and what does riot do they banned all 5 of them 14 day suspension for playing the way they did.

Links up above for all the information you need I'm just trying to share this with everyone.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/195463568089546752/344561188484415488/buV739O9QsWdRDVSeTOBkQ.png
